text: Follow Thru is a 1930 American romantic musical comedy movie. It was directed by Lloyd Corrigan. The movie is based on the 1929 musical of the same name. Actors include Charles "Buddy" Rogers, Nancy Carroll, Zelma O'Neal, Jack Haley, Eugene Pallette, and Thelma Todd. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1930 musical movies Category:1930 romantic comedy movies Category:American musical movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Lloyd Corrigan Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Follow Thru
